title: Grant supports new interdisciplinary Ph.D. program focused on big data and urbanization (Virginia Tech - ...
text: ( Source : Virginia Tech - Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University ) NATIONAL CAPITAL REGION, Oct. 8, 2015 - Virginia Tech will create a new Ph.D. certificate program focused on big data and urbanization with a grant of nearly $3
